Articles.Content:
Hi everyone .

Today i try a replica of the Rafale jet Fighter , except BD-Armory the other parts are stock .

Craft :

- 70 parts

- 13.4 Tons ( Armed )

- 425 L of fuel

- Twin basic jet engine

- 8 Helfire

- 2 Sidewinder

- 2 Howitzer

- 2 CM

Key Bind :

Stage : Next weapon

Light : Flap

RCS : Fire

Abord : AI Pilot + Combat Mode ( Toggle )

SPH View :

![KSP%202015-05-14%2021-29-53-16.jpg?psid=1](https://grzbdg-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2pfWaMaMYVyGE-AyX_abOArP7qnJg5HFtZxmr4PJaz14orXToFzRiBqsPYWjYW4QPSZA76SUJmYzIiOD80JOXHefvF3Wo2EgmtmsE0xBXUPUF9ZaeOp4-Vzf6I_65DTTzo9Xpxf6tHxKgLx55VZRFUqKh9EiIVJRc4mx5MhJqOCGY/KSP%202015-05-14%2021-29-53-16.jpg?psid=1)

In air :

![Rafale.gif?psid=1](https://grzbdg-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2puQdrSvOJVfD8VH-ygl8sFGJW--xW8gpz6YOvSMrqOjEvP57ajDBxhPLcMFpUGI1IcPfJaBRVLHMeZ6xXpZWu0WoU9V3GOOusY0zts_QQmbxgHCt4SIOqg7F0_gQKyTEhnjz4uzidb2R_BYZrsfR1xyXjz8CYgtCl2o9DDccR1Z0/Rafale.gif?psid=1)

See ya !
